artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Kawaguchiya Shōzō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #10.?
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Ootori no/ takaki kokoro no/ kimi yue ni/ uki misosasai/ yori mo tsukarezu 寄鳥想　大鵬の　たかき心の　君ゆへに　うきみてさゝゐ　よりもつかれす
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of pictures of flowers and birds with poem in chūtanzaku
title: Wren on Chrysanthemum
